column4: Alright, I've got a problem....I have ubuntu 11.10 installed on my mac mini with a windows xp virtual machine installed on it....I'm trying to get video off my camcorder that is stored in DV format...how do I do that?
Surely you could just drag and drop the video file?
If you mean in the VM then you need to install guest additions and share a usb device (in the VBox settings).
The cable to transfer the video is a IEEE 1394 b to firewire 400
It doesn't pick up the firewire port though....any ideas why?
It's an old camcorder but I need it for christmas
I've already got guest additions installed...it can't see the firewire
You have to share it in the virtual box settings ben_
alright, thank you I'll take a look at that tutorial
Will work on all of them.
is there firewire support in virtual box?  do you know ?
someguy ...."That hardware is becoming more rare these days and VB does not support it."...crap!
